Pre-Game Insights: Xzavion Curry has a 5.02 ERA and has been worse as a starter, posting a 5.29 ERA.

The Blue Jays' bullpen is the second-worst in the majors with a 4.83 ERA.
Vladimir Guerrero Jr. needs just one hit to reach 200 for the first time in his career.

The Over is 5-1 in the last six meetings at Rogers Centre.
The Over is 10-1 in Miami’s last 11 games against the American League.
Others: The game is scheduled for Rogers Centre in Toronto on Saturday, September 28, 2024.
